title: House of Far Niente Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, October 22, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an elegant tasting featuring the celebrated Far Niente family of wines, including selections from Post & Beam, Bella Union, and Nickel & Nickel. Experience the craftsmanship and sophistication that have made Far Niente one of Napa Valley’s most enduring icons.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Post & Beam by Far Niente Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – 95 pts Tasting Panel, 92 pts Wine Enthusiast – Plush and refined with dark plum, espresso, and chocolate layered over satin-smooth tannins.

• Post & Beam by Far Niente Carneros Chardonnay 2022 – 94 pts Wine Enthusiast, 91 pts James Suckling – Rich and creamy with baked pear, golden apple, and toasted vanilla balanced by bright acidity.

• Bella Union by Far Niente Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – 95 pts Tasting Panel, 92 pts Wine Enthusiast – Deep and expressive with cassis, black cherry, and dark chocolate unfolding through a long, structured finish.

• Nickel & Nickel Truchard Vineyard Chardonnay 2023 – 94 pts James Suckling, 90 pts Wine Spectator – Elegant and vibrant with tangerine, pear, and honeysuckle over a mineral-driven, polished finish.

Discover the artistry of the Far Niente portfolio, where tradition, precision, and Napa Valley terroir unite in every glass.
